svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net"><diagram name="CI/CD Pipeline" id="cicd-pipe"><mxGraphModel dx="1200" dy="820" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1200" pageHeight="820"><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/></root></mxGraphModel></diagram></mxfile>

g.text: yarn install → yarn build → S3 Upload → CloudFront Invalidation
Env: VITE_AUTH0_*, VITE_API_BASE_URL from Terraform outputs
Key Vault secrets: ACR-NAME, IMAGE-NAME, BACKEND-WORKING-DIRECTORY,
Key Vault secrets: AUTH0-CLIENT-ID, AUTH0-DOMAIN, AUTH0-AUDIENCE, API-BASE-URL,
No static secrets stored in GitHub. Key Vault used for all runtime config.
IAM Roles for CodePipeline/CodeBuild. Artifacts stored in S3.
